content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction area
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)
- Beltgroup (position connecting burner mining drill to furnace)

### Iron plate production area
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)
- Assembling machine (position y)
- Inserter (position z that puts into assembling machine)
- Beltgroup (position connecting furnace to assembling machine)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates.

### Errors when extracting from furnaces
- Make sure to check the furnace inventory before extracting items to avoid attempting to extract from an empty furnace.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.
